data.name: LC_Appearance
data.value: Appearance

data.name: LC_Data
data.value: Data

data.name: LC_Behavior
data.value: Behavior

data.name: LC_Display
data.value: Display

data.name: LC_Ribbon Properties
data.value: Ribbon Properties

data.name: LD_RibbonWindowContentHost_P_CaptionVisibility
data.value: Returns a 'Visibility' that indicates the expected visibility state of the caption of the 'RibbonWindowContentHost'.

data.name: LD_RibbonWindowContentHost_P_IconResolved
data.value: Returns the image used as the icon for the window.

data.name: LD_RibbonWindowContentHost_P_Ribbon
data.value: Returns/sets the XamRibbon control to be displayed within the caption area of the containing XamRibbonWindow.

data.name: LD_RibbonWindowContentHost_P_StatusBar
data.value: Returns/sets the element that should be positioned along the bottom edge of the window to serve as a status bar.

data.name: LD_GalleryToolPreviewPresenter_P_GalleryTool
data.value: Returns the associated 'GalleryTool' whose 'GalleryItem' instances will be displayed in the preview.

data.name: LD_GalleryToolPreviewPresenter_P_MaxColumns
data.value: Returns the maximum number of columns to be displayed within the preview.

data.name: LD_GalleryToolPreviewPresenter_P_MinColumns
data.value: Returns the minimum number of columns to be displayed within the preview.

data.name: LD_ToolMenuItem_P_IsSegmented
data.value: Gets whether this element represents a MenuTool with a Segmented ButtonType.

data.name: LD_ToolMenuItem_P_IsSeparator
data.value: Gets whether this element represents a SeparatorTool.

data.name: LD_ToolMenuItem_P_Location
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the location of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_ToolMenuItem_P_MenuItemDescriptionMinWidth
data.value: Description

data.name: LD_ToolMenuItem_P_PopupVerticalScrollBarVisibility
data.value: Returns the visibility to be used by the ScrollViever inside the Popup (read-only)

data.name: LD_ToolMenuItem_P_ResizeMode
data.value: Gets/sets whether the popup can be resized

data.name: LD_ToolMenuItem_P_UseLargeImage
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating whether the menu item should display a large image.

data.name: LD_ApplicationMenuPresenter_P_HasFooterToolbar
data.value: Returns true if the FooterToolbar property has been set to an instance of ApplicationMenuFooterToolbar (read-only).

data.name: LD_QuickAccessToolbar_P_IsBelowRibbon
data.value: Returns true if the QuickAccessToolbar is positioned below the XamRibbon, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_QuickAccessToolbar_P_IsOverflowOpen
data.value: Returns/sets whether the QuickAccessToolbar overflow area is open.

data.name: LD_QuickAccessToolbar_P_OverflowButtonVisibility
data.value: Returns the visibility of the QuickAccessToolbar overflow button. The Overflow button is visible when there is not enough room on the QuickAccessToolbar to show all its tools (read-only).

data.name: LC_Ribbon Events
data.value: Ribbon Events

data.name: LD_QuickAccessToolbar_E_QuickCustomizeMenuOpening
data.value: Occurs when the QuickCustomizeMenu is about to be displayed to the end user.

data.name: LD_GalleryToolDropDownPresenter_P_IsFirstInMenu
data.value: Returns true if the gallery is the first visible item in the menu

data.name: LD_GalleryToolDropDownPresenter_P_IsLastInMenu
data.value: Returns true if the gallery is the last visible item in the menu

data.name: LD_GalleryToolDropDownPresenter_P_VerticalScrollBarVisibility
data.value: Returns the visibility of the vertical scrollbar (read-only)

data.name: LD_MenuToolPresenter_P_PreviewGalleryVisibility
data.value: Returns true if a GalleryTool preview is visible in the MenuToolBase button area. To display a GalleryTool preview in the MenuToolBase, add the GalleryTool to the Menu's Items collection and set the Menu's PreviewGalleryToolId to the XamRibbon.Id property of the GalleryTool.

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_P_IsOpen
data.value: Gets/sets whether the menu is open.

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_P_MenuItemDescriptionMinWidth
data.value: Returns/sets the minimum width of the MenuItemDescriptions (if any) associated with the MenuTool's menu items.

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_P_UseLargeImages
data.value: Returns/sets a boolean indicating whether the items within the menu should display large images.

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_P_Caption
data.value: Returns/sets the caption associated with the tool.

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_P_HasCaption
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a caption with a length greater than zero, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_P_Id
data.value: Returns/sets the Id associated with the tool.

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_P_IsActive
data.value: Returns true if the tool is the current active item, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_P_IsQatCommonTool
data.value: Returns true if the tool should be shown in the list of 'common tools' displayed in the QuickAccessToolbar's Quick Customize Menu.

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_P_IsOnQat
data.value: Returns true if the tool (or an instance of the tool with the same Id) exists on the QuickAccessToolbar, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_P_KeyTip
data.value: A string with a maximum length of 3 characters that is used to navigate to the item when keytips.

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_P_Location
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the location of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_P_SizingMode
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the current size of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_E_Cloned
data.value: Occurs after a tool has been cloned

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_E_CloneDiscarded
data.value: Occurs when a clone of a tool is being discarded.

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_E_Closed
data.value: Occurs after this tool has been closed

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_E_Opened
data.value: Occurs after this tool has been opened

data.name: LD_MenuToolBase_E_Opening
data.value: Occurs before this tool has been opened

data.name: LD_GalleryWrapPanel_P_ColumnSpacing
data.value: Returns/sets the amount of space between columns in device independent pixels.

data.name: LD_GalleryWrapPanel_P_ColumnWidth
data.value: Returns/sets the preferred width for the columns.

data.name: LD_GalleryWrapPanel_P_MaxColumns
data.value: Returns the maximum number of columns in which the items should be arranged.

data.name: LD_GalleryWrapPanel_P_MinColumns
data.value: Returns/sets the minimum number of columns in which the items should be arranged.

data.name: LD_GalleryWrapPanel_P_PreferredColumns
data.value: Returns the preferred number of columns in which to arrange the items.

data.name: LD_GalleryWrapPanel_P_RowHeight
data.value: Returns/sets the preferred height for the rows and therefore the heights of the items.

data.name: LD_GalleryItemSettings_P_GalleryItemPresenterStyle
data.value: Returns/sets the Style for the GalleryItemPresenter that is used to display the GalleryItem.

data.name: LD_GalleryItemSettings_P_GalleryItemPresenterStyleSelector
data.value: Returns/sets a Style Selector that can be used to dynamically assign a style for the GalleryItemPresenter used to display the GalleryItem.

data.name: LD_GalleryItemSettings_P_HorizontalTextAlignment
data.value: Returns/sets the horizontal alignment of the GalleryItem text.

data.name: LD_GalleryItemSettings_P_SelectionDisplayMode
data.value: Returns/sets a value that determines what area (if any) of the GalleryItem is highlighted when the item is selected.

data.name: LD_GalleryItemSettings_P_TextPlacement
data.value: Returns/sets a value that determines the placement of a GalleryItem's text with respect to its image.

data.name: LD_GalleryItemSettings_P_TextDisplayMode
data.value: Returns/sets a value that determines when the GalleryItem's text is displayed.

data.name: LD_GalleryItemSettings_P_VerticalTextAlignment
data.value: Returns/sets the vertical alignment of the GalleryItem text.

data.name: LD_GalleryItem_P_ColumnSpan
data.value: Returns/sets number of logical columns the GalleryItem should span when it is displayed in the GalleryTool dropdown.

data.name: LD_GalleryItem_P_Image
data.value: Returns/sets the image to display for the item.

data.name: LD_GalleryItem_P_IsSelected
data.value: Returns/sets whether this GalleryItem is the selected item in the GalleryTool.

data.name: LD_GalleryItem_P_Key
data.value: Returns/sets the string key associated with this GalleryItem.

data.name: LD_GalleryItem_P_Settings
data.value: Returns/sets the settings that will be used for the GalleryItem.

data.name: LD_GalleryItem_P_Text
data.value: Returns/sets the text that is displayed for the GalleryItem when it is displayed in the GalleryTool dropdown.

data.name: LD_GalleryItem_P_Tag
data.value: Returns/sets optional user data that is stored with the GalleryItem.

data.name: LD_QatPlaceholderTool_P_Target
data.value: Returns the tool instance associated with this QatPlaceholderTool. (read-only)

data.name: LD_QatPlaceholderTool_P_TargetId
data.value: Returns/sets the string Id of the tool or RibbonGroup associated with this QatPlaceholderTool.

data.name: LD_QatPlaceholderTool_P_TargetType
data.value: Returns/sets the enumeration that identifies the type of object (e.g. tool or RibbonGroup) that the placeholder represents.

data.name: LD_GalleryItemPresenter_P_HorizontalTextAlignmentResolved
data.value: Returns the resolved value of the HorizontalTextAlignment property on the GalleryItemSettings for the GalleryItem. (read-only)

data.name: LD_GalleryItemPresenter_P_IsHighlighted
data.value: Returns true if the GalleryItem is currently highlighted inside the GalleryToolDropDownPresenter. (read-only)

data.name: LD_GalleryItemPresenter_P_IsInPreviewArea
data.value: Returns true if the GalleryItem is being displayed in the GalleryTool preview area. (read-only)

data.name: LD_GalleryItemPresenter_P_IsSelected
data.value: Returns true if the GalleryItem is the current selected item in the GalleryTool. (read-only)

data.name: LD_GalleryItemPresenter_P_Item
data.value: Returns the GalleryItem associated with this GalleryItemPresenter. (read-only)

data.name: LD_GalleryItemPresenter_P_SelectionDisplayModeResolved
data.value: Returns a value that determines what part of the GalleryItem (if any) is highlighted when the item is selected. (read-only)

data.name: LD_GalleryItemPresenter_P_TextPlacementResolved
data.value: Returns a value that determines where the GalleryItem.Text is displayed with respect to the Gallerytem.Image. (read-only)

data.name: LD_GalleryItemPresenter_P_TextVisibility
data.value: Returns a value that determines if the GalleryItem text is displayed. (read-only)

data.name: LD_GalleryItemPresenter_P_VerticalTextAlignmentResolved
data.value: Returns the resolved value of the VerticalTextAlignment property on the GalleryItemSettings for the GalleryItem. (read-only)

data.name: LD_XamRibbonScreenTip_P_ContentImage
data.value: Returns/sets the image associated with the content area of the XamScreenTip. The default value is null.

data.name: LD_ToggleButtonTool_P_Caption
data.value: Returns/sets the caption associated with the tool.

data.name: LD_ToggleButtonTool_P_HasCaption
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a caption with a length greater than zero, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_ToggleButtonTool_P_HasImage
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a SmallImage specified, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_ToggleButtonTool_P_Id
data.value: Returns/sets the Id associated with the tool.

data.name: LD_ToggleButtonTool_P_ImageResolved
data.value: Returns the image to be used by the tool based on its current location and sizing mode.

data.name: LD_ToggleButtonTool_P_IsActive
data.value: Returns true if the tool is the current active item, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_ToggleButtonTool_P_IsQatCommonTool
data.value: Returns true if the tool should be shown in the list of 'common tools' displayed in the QuickAccessToolbar's Quick Customize Menu.

data.name: LD_ToggleButtonTool_P_IsOnQat
data.value: Returns true if the tool (or an instance of the tool with the same Id) exists on the QuickAccessToolbar, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_ToggleButtonTool_P_KeyTip
data.value: A string with a maximum length of 3 characters that is used to navigate to the item when keytips.

data.name: LD_ToggleButtonTool_P_LargeImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 32x32 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageAndTextLarge.

data.name: LD_ToggleButtonTool_P_Location
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the location of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_ToggleButtonTool_P_SizingMode
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the current size of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_ToggleButtonTool_P_SmallImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 16x16 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageOnly or ImageAndTextNormal.

data.name: LD_ToggleButtonTool_E_Cloned
data.value: Occurs after a tool has been cloned

data.name: LD_ToggleButtonTool_E_CloneDiscarded
data.value: Occurs when a clone of a tool is being discarded.

data.name: LD_DropDownToggle_P_IsDroppedDown
data.value: Gets/sest the drop down state.

data.name: LD_DropDownToggle_P_IsPressed
data.value: Returns whether the element is being pressed (read-only).

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_ActiveItem
data.value: Returns the currently active item in the XamRibbon. An active item can be a Tool, a 'RibbonTabItem' or a 'RibbonGroup'.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_AllowMinimize
data.value: Returns/sets whether the XamRibbon can be minimized. When the XamRibbon is minimized only the tabs are visible.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_ApplicationMenu
data.value: Returns/sets the ApplicationMenu that is displayed when the ApplicationMenu button (displayed in the upper left corner of the XamRibbon) is clicked.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_AutoHideEnabled
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating whether the 'XamRibbon' will automatically hide its contents when the width/height of the root containing visual (e.g. Window) is below the horizontal/vertical threshold.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_AutoHideHorizontalThreshold
data.value: Returns/sets the minimum width of the containing root visual (e.g. the window) at which the contents XamRibbon will be visible.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_AutoHideState
data.value: Returns the current auto hide state of the ribbon; that is, whether the contents of the ribbon are hidden because the size of the containing visual are below the minimum threshold.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_AutoHideVerticalThreshold
data.value: Returns/sets the minimum height of the containing root visual (e.g. the window) at which the contents XamRibbon will be visible.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_ContextualTabGroups
data.value: Returns a modifiable collection of ContextualTabGroup instances that represents all the ContextualTabGroups (visible and not visible) in the XamRibbon.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_IsInHighContrastMode
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating if the Ribbon is using the system high contrast color scheme.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_IsMinimized
data.value: Returns/sets whether the XamRibbon is minimized.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_IsWithinRibbonWindow
data.value: Returns true if the XamRibbon is being hosted within a 'XamRibbonWindow', otherwise returns false.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_IsRibbonGroupResizingEnabled
data.value: Returns/sets a boolean indicating whether the 'RibbonGroup' instances in the selected tab should be resized when there is not enough room to display the groups within the Ribbon.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_QuickAccessToolbar
data.value: Returns/sets the QuickAccessToolbar for the XamRibbon.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_QuickAccessToolbarLocation
data.value: Returns/sets a value that indicates where the QuickAccessToolbar should be displayed. Possible locations include above the ribbon tab area or below the ribbon.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_SelectedTab
data.value: Returns/sets the selected tab.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_Tabs
data.value: Returns a collection of RibbonTabItems that represents tabs added directly to the Ribbon. This does not include RibbonTabItems added to the ContextualTabGroups collection.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_TabsInView
data.value: Returns a read-only collection of the RibbonTabItems that are currently in view.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_Theme
data.value: Gets/sets the default look for the control.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_P_ToolsNotInRibbon
data.value: Returns a modifiable collection of the Tools that are not sited on a RibbonGroup, ApplicationMenuFooterToolbar or MenuTool.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_E_ThemeChanged
data.value: Invoked when the 'Theme' property has been changed.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_E_ActiveItemChanged
data.value: Occurs when the 'ActiveItem' property has changed.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_E_ExecutingCommand
data.value: Cancelable event that occurs before the action associated with a command is performed

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_E_ExecutedCommand
data.value: Occurs after the action associated with a command is performed

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_E_RibbonTabItemCloseUp
data.value: Occurs when the 'IsMinimized' of the XamRibbon is true and the popup for the 'SelectedTab' has closed up.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_E_RibbonTabItemOpened
data.value: Occurs when the 'IsMinimized' of the XamRibbon is true and the popup for the 'SelectedTab' has been opened.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_E_RibbonTabItemOpening
data.value: Occurs when the 'IsMinimized' of the XamRibbon is true and the popup for the 'SelectedTab' is being opened.

data.name: LD_XamRibbon_E_RibbonTabItemSelected
data.value: Occurs after a RibbonTabItem has been selected.

data.name: LD_RadioButtonTool_P_Caption
data.value: Returns/sets the caption associated with the tool.

data.name: LD_RadioButtonTool_P_HasCaption
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a caption with a length greater than zero, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_RadioButtonTool_P_HasImage
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a SmallImage specified, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_RadioButtonTool_P_Id
data.value: Returns/sets the Id associated with the tool.

data.name: LD_RadioButtonTool_P_ImageResolved
data.value: Returns the image to be used by the tool based on its current location and sizing mode.

data.name: LD_RadioButtonTool_P_IsActive
data.value: Returns true if the tool is the current active item, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_RadioButtonTool_P_IsQatCommonTool
data.value: Returns true if the tool should be shown in the list of 'common tools' displayed in the QuickAccessToolbar's Quick Customize Menu.

data.name: LD_RadioButtonTool_P_IsOnQat
data.value: Returns true if the tool (or an instance of the tool with the same Id) exists on the QuickAccessToolbar, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_RadioButtonTool_P_KeyTip
data.value: A string with a maximum length of 3 characters that is used to navigate to the item when keytips.

data.name: LD_RadioButtonTool_P_LargeImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 32x32 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageAndTextLarge.

data.name: LD_RadioButtonTool_P_Location
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the location of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_RadioButtonTool_P_SizingMode
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the current size of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_RadioButtonTool_P_SmallImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 16x16 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageOnly or ImageAndTextNormal.

data.name: LD_RadioButtonTool_E_Cloned
data.value: Occurs after a tool has been cloned

data.name: LD_RadioButtonTool_E_CloneDiscarded
data.value: Occurs when a clone of a tool is being discarded.

data.name: LD_ApplicationMenu_P_FooterToolbar
data.value: Returns/sets the toolbar that will be placed at the bottom of the application menu.

data.name: LD_ApplicationMenu_P_HasRecentItemsHeader
data.value: Indicates whether the 'RecentItemsHeader' is null

data.name: LD_ApplicationMenu_P_Image
data.value: Gets/sets the image that will be displayed on the ApplicationMenu button in the XamRibbon.

data.name: LD_ApplicationMenu_P_RecentItems
data.value: The collection of items displayed in the right hand side of the dropdown of the ApplicationMenu.

data.name: LD_ApplicationMenu_P_RecentItemsHeader
data.value: Returns/sets the object that is displayed in the header area over the recent items within the dropdown of the ApplicationMenu

data.name: LD_ApplicationMenu_P_RecentItemsHeaderTemplate
data.value: Returns/sets the template used to display the content of the 'RecentItemsHeader'.

data.name: LD_ApplicationMenu_P_RecentItemsHeaderTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets/sets a template selector that can provide selection logic for the template used to display the 'RecentItemsHeader'.

data.name: LD_KeyTip_P_Value
data.value: Returns/sets the value of the keytip

data.name: LD_ContextualTabGroup_P_BaseBackColor
data.value: Returns the color that should be used to determine the background for the caption of the group as well as the background of the tabs in the group.

data.name: LD_ContextualTabGroup_P_BaseBackColorResolved
data.value: Returns the resolved 'BaseBackColor' that should be used to render the tab group caption as well as the tab items in the group.

data.name: LD_ContextualTabGroup_P_BaseBackColorResolvedBrush
data.value: Returns a 'SolidColorBrush' using the 'BaseBackColorResolved'.

data.name: LD_ContextualTabGroup_P_Caption
data.value: Returns/sets the caption of the ContextualTabGroup.

data.name: LD_ContextualTabGroup_P_IsVisible
data.value: Returns/sets whether the ContextualTabGroup is Visible. When set to false, any RibbonTabItems in the ContextualTabGroup will be hidden.

data.name: LD_ContextualTabGroup_P_Key
data.value: Returns/sets the key of the ContextualTabGroup in the ContextualTabGroupCollection.

data.name: LD_ContextualTabGroup_P_Tabs
data.value: Returns a collection of RibbonTabItems that belong to the ContextualTabGroup.

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_P_Caption
data.value: Returns/sets the caption associated with the tool.

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_P_HasCaption
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a caption with a length greater than zero, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_P_HasImage
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a SmallImage specified, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_P_Id
data.value: Returns/sets the Id associated with the tool.

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_P_ImageResolved
data.value: Returns the image to be used by the tool based on its current location and sizing mode.

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_P_IsActive
data.value: Returns true if the tool is the current active item, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_P_IsQatCommonTool
data.value: Returns true if the tool should be shown in the list of 'common tools' displayed in the QuickAccessToolbar's Quick Customize Menu.

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_P_IsOnQat
data.value: Returns true if the tool (or an instance of the tool with the same Id) exists on the QuickAccessToolbar, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_P_KeyTip
data.value: A string with a maximum length of 3 characters that is used to navigate to the item when keytips.

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_P_LargeImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 32x32 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageAndTextLarge.

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_P_Location
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the location of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_P_SizingMode
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the current size of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_P_SmallImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 16x16 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageOnly or ImageAndTextNormal.

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_P_EditAreaWidth
data.value: Specifies the width of the edit area, excluding the label.

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_E_Cloned
data.value: Occurs after a tool has been cloned

data.name: LD_TextEditorTool_E_CloneDiscarded
data.value: Occurs when a clone of a tool is being discarded.

data.name: LD_MenuButtonArea_P_HasImage
data.value: Returns true is the associated MenuTool has a large or small image.

data.name: LD_MenuButtonArea_P_IsActive
data.value: Returns true is the associated MenuTool is the ActiveItem

data.name: LD_MenuButtonArea_P_IsCheckable
data.value: Returns whether the associated MenuTool is checkable.

data.name: LD_MenuButtonArea_P_IsQuickCustomizeMenu
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating whether the associated menu tool represents the quick customize menu of the QuickAccessToolbar.

data.name: LD_MenuButtonArea_P_IsSegmented
data.value: Returns whether the associated MenuTool is segmented.

data.name: LD_MenuButtonArea_P_Location
data.value: Returns the current location for the associated menu tool.

data.name: LD_MenuButtonArea_P_MenuToolPresenter
data.value: Returns the associated MenuToolPresenter.

data.name: LD_MenuButtonArea_P_SizingMode
data.value: Returns the current sizing mode for the associated menu tool.

data.name: LD_GalleryItemGroup_P_ItemKeys
data.value: Returns a collection of GalleryItem keys that represents the GalleryItems that have been assigned to this GalleryItemGroup.

data.name: LD_GalleryItemGroup_P_ItemSettings
data.value: Returns/sets the settings that serve as the default settings for all GalleryItems in this GalleryItemGroup.

data.name: LD_GalleryItemGroup_P_GalleryTool
data.value: Returns the owning GalleryTool

data.name: LD_GalleryItemGroup_P_Title
data.value: Returns/sets the Title that is displayed for the GalleryItemGroup.

data.name: LD_ToolVerticalWrapPanel_P_VerticalToolAlignment
data.value: Returns/sets a value that determines how items are arranged vertically when there are less than 3 small items within a column.

data.name: LD_RibbonGroup_P_Caption
data.value: Returns/sets the caption associated with the RibbonGroup.

data.name: LD_RibbonGroup_P_DialogBoxLauncherTool
data.value: Returns/sets the tool that will be displayed within the caption area of the RibbonGroup.

data.name: LD_RibbonGroup_P_HasDialogBoxLauncherTool
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating whether the 'DialogBoxLauncherTool' has been set to a 'ButtonTool'.

data.name: LD_RibbonGroup_P_Id
data.value: Returns/sets a string used to uniquely identify the 'RibbonGroup' with the 'XamRibbon'.

data.name: LD_RibbonGroup_P_IsActive
data.value: Returns true if the RibbonGroup is the current active item, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_RibbonGroup_P_IsCollapsed
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating if the ribbon group is currently collapsed.

data.name: LD_RibbonGroup_P_IsInContextualTabGroup
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating whether the 'RibbonTabItem' to which the 'RibbonGroup' belongs is part of a 'ContextualTabGroup'.

data.name: LD_RibbonGroup_P_IsOpen
data.value: Gets/sets whether the RibbonGroup is open.

data.name: LD_RibbonGroup_P_KeyTip
data.value: A string with a maximum length of 3 characters that is used to navigate to the item when keytips.

data.name: LD_RibbonGroup_P_Location
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the location of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_RibbonGroup_P_SmallImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 16x16 image to be used when the RibbonGroup is collapsed or displayed in the QuickAccessToolbar.

data.name: LD_RibbonGroup_P_Variants
data.value: A collection of 'GroupVariant' instances that determine the order/priority in which the group will be resized within the containing 'RibbonTabItem'.

data.name: LD_RibbonGroup_E_Closed
data.value: Occurs after the RibbonGroup has been closed

data.name: LD_RibbonGroup_E_Opened
data.value: Occurs after the RibbonGroup has been opened

data.name: LD_RibbonGroup_E_Opening
data.value: Occurs before the RibbonGroup has been opened

data.name: LD_ButtonTool_P_Caption
data.value: Returns/sets the caption associated with the tool.

data.name: LD_ButtonTool_P_HasCaption
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a caption with a length greater than zero, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_ButtonTool_P_HasImage
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a SmallImage specified, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_ButtonTool_P_Id
data.value: Returns/sets the Id associated with the tool.

data.name: LD_ButtonTool_P_ImageResolved
data.value: Returns the image to be used by the tool based on its current location and sizing mode.

data.name: LD_ButtonTool_P_IsActive
data.value: Returns true if the tool is the current active item, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_ButtonTool_P_IsQatCommonTool
data.value: Returns true if the tool should be shown in the list of 'common tools' displayed in the QuickAccessToolbar's Quick Customize Menu.

data.name: LD_ButtonTool_P_IsOnQat
data.value: Returns true if the tool (or an instance of the tool with the same Id) exists on the QuickAccessToolbar, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_ButtonTool_P_KeyTip
data.value: A string with a maximum length of 3 characters that is used to navigate to the item when keytips.

data.name: LD_ButtonTool_P_LargeImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 32x32 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageAndTextLarge.

data.name: LD_ButtonTool_P_Location
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the location of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_ButtonTool_P_SizingMode
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the current size of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_ButtonTool_P_SmallImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 16x16 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageOnly or ImageAndTextNormal.

data.name: LD_ButtonTool_E_Cloned
data.value: Occurs after a tool has been cloned

data.name: LD_ButtonTool_E_CloneDiscarded
data.value: Occurs when a clone of a tool is being discarded.

data.name: LD_GroupVariant_P_Priority
data.value: Returns/sets the priority assigned to a 'RibbonGroup' which determines the order in which 'RibbonGroups' are resized when the 'XamRibbon' is resized. RibbonGroups that have been assigned a lower priority will be resized first.

data.name: LD_GroupVariant_P_ResizeAction
data.value: Returns/sets the resize action that will be performed when the 'Priority' caused the variant to be applied.

data.name: LD_RibbonTabItem_P_IsFirstTabInContextualTabGroup
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating whether this is the first visible tab item in a ContextualTabGroup

data.name: LD_RibbonTabItem_P_IsInContextualTabGroup
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating whether the tab is part of a ContextualTabGroup

data.name: LD_RibbonTabItem_P_IsLastTabInContextualTabGroup
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating whether this is the last visible tab item in a ContextualTabGroup

data.name: LD_RibbonTabItem_P_KeyTip
data.value: A string with a maximum length of 3 characters that is used to navigate to the item when keytips.

data.name: LD_RibbonTabItem_P_RibbonGroups
data.value: Returns the RibbonGroups defined on this RibbonTab (read only).

data.name: LD_MenuTool_P_ButtonType
data.value: Gets/sets how this tool is used. Either as a single drop down or segmented into a dropdown area and a button area

data.name: LD_MenuTool_P_Command
data.value: Gets or sets the command to invoke when the button portion of the menu tool is pressed.

data.name: LD_MenuTool_P_CommandParameter
data.value: Gets or sets the parameter to pass to the Command property.

data.name: LD_MenuTool_P_CommandTarget
data.value: Gets or sets the element on which to raise the specified command.

data.name: LD_MenuTool_P_IsChecked
data.value: Gets/sets whether the tool is checked.

data.name: LD_MenuTool_P_KeyTipForSegmentedButton
data.value: Gets/sets a string with a maximum of 3 characters that represents the mnemonic that is displayed for the button portion of the tool. Note: this property is ignored unless the ButtonType is set to ‘Segmented’ or ‘SegmentedState’. When the mnemonic is entered the Click event will be raised. The Checked or Unchecked events will also be raised for the ‘SegmentedState’ button type.

data.name: LD_MenuTool_P_ShouldDisplayGalleryPreview
data.value: Gets/sets whether a gallery tool will display its items in the gallery preview area of the menu when it is displayed on a RibbonGroup

data.name: LD_MenuTool_P_HasImage
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a SmallImage specified, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_MenuTool_P_ImageResolved
data.value: Returns the image to be used by the tool based on its current location and sizing mode.

data.name: LD_MenuTool_P_LargeImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 32x32 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageAndTextLarge.

data.name: LD_MenuTool_P_SmallImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 16x16 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageOnly or ImageAndTextNormal.

data.name: LD_MenuTool_E_Checked
data.value: Occurs after this tool has been checked

data.name: LD_MenuTool_E_Click
data.value: Occurs when the button portion of the segmented button has been clicked.

data.name: LD_MenuTool_E_Unchecked
data.value: Occurs after this tool has been unchecked

data.name: LD_SeparatorTool_P_Location
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the location of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_SeparatorTool_E_Cloned
data.value: Occurs after a tool has been cloned

data.name: LD_SeparatorTool_E_CloneDiscarded
data.value: Occurs when a clone of a tool is being discarded.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_ActivationActionDelay
data.value: Returns/sets the number of milliseconds after a GalleryItem is activated before the ItemActivated event is fired.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_ActivationInitialActionDelay
data.value: Returns/sets the number of milliseconds after a GalleryItem is activated before the ItemActivated event is fired.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_AllowResizeDropDown
data.value: Resturns/sets a value that indicates whether the GalleryTool dropdown can be resized.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_Groups
data.value: Returns a collection of the GalleryItemGroups displayed in the GalleryTool dropdown.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_ItemBehavior
data.value: Returns/sets the behavior of GalleryItems when they are clicked.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_Items
data.value: Returns a collection of the GalleryItems defined in the GalleryTool.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_ItemSettings
data.value: Returns/sets the settings that will be used as the default for all GalleryItems in each GalleryItemGroup.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_MaxDropDownColumns
data.value: Returns/sets the maximum number of columns that can be displayed in the gallery drop down.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_MaxPreviewColumns
data.value: Returns/sets the maximum number of columns that can be displayed in the gallery preview.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_MinDropDownColumns
data.value: Returns/sets the minimum number of columns that can be displayed in the gallery drop down.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_MinPreviewColumns
data.value: Returns/sets the minimum number of columns that can be displayed in the gallery preview.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_PreferredDropDownColumns
data.value: Returns/sets the preferred number of columns that should be displayed in the gallery drop down.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_PreviewItems
data.value: Returns a read-only list off all the GalleryItems defined in the GalleryTool. It is used to show the items in the preview area.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_SelectedItem
data.value: Returns/sets the currently selected GalleryItem or null if no GalleryItem is currently selected.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_Caption
data.value: Returns/sets the caption associated with the tool.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_HasCaption
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a caption with a length greater than zero, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_HasImage
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a SmallImage specified, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_Id
data.value: Returns/sets the Id associated with the tool.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_ImageResolved
data.value: Returns the image to be used by the tool based on its current location and sizing mode.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_IsActive
data.value: Returns true if the tool is the current active item, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_IsQatCommonTool
data.value: Returns true if the tool should be shown in the list of 'common tools' displayed in the QuickAccessToolbar's Quick Customize Menu.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_IsOnQat
data.value: Returns true if the tool (or an instance of the tool with the same Id) exists on the QuickAccessToolbar, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_KeyTip
data.value: A string with a maximum length of 3 characters that is used to navigate to the item when keytips.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_LargeImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 32x32 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageAndTextLarge.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_Location
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the location of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_SizingMode
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the current size of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_P_SmallImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 16x16 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageOnly or ImageAndTextNormal.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_E_Cloned
data.value: Occurs after a tool has been cloned

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_E_CloneDiscarded
data.value: Occurs when a clone of a tool is being discarded.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_E_ItemActivated
data.value: Occurs after a GalleryItem has been activated

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_E_ItemClicked
data.value: Occurs after a GalleryItem has been clicked.

data.name: LD_GalleryTool_E_ItemSelected
data.value: Occurs after a GalleryItem has been clicked.

data.name: LD_ToolHorizontalWrapPanel_P_RowCount
data.value: Returns the number of rows that the panel is using to arrange its items.

data.name: LD_ToolHorizontalWrapPanel_P_MaxRows
data.value: Returns/sets the maximum number of rows that the panel can use to arrange its items.

data.name: LD_ToolHorizontalWrapPanel_P_MinRows
data.value: Returns/sets the preferred number of rows that the panel should use to arrange its items.

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_P_Caption
data.value: Returns/sets the caption associated with the tool.

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_P_HasCaption
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a caption with a length greater than zero, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_P_HasImage
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a SmallImage specified, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_P_Id
data.value: Returns/sets the Id associated with the tool.

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_P_ImageResolved
data.value: Returns the image to be used by the tool based on its current location and sizing mode.

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_P_IsActive
data.value: Returns true if the tool is the current active item, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_P_IsQatCommonTool
data.value: Returns true if the tool should be shown in the list of 'common tools' displayed in the QuickAccessToolbar's Quick Customize Menu.

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_P_IsOnQat
data.value: Returns true if the tool (or an instance of the tool with the same Id) exists on the QuickAccessToolbar, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_P_KeyTip
data.value: A string with a maximum length of 3 characters that is used to navigate to the item when keytips.

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_P_LargeImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 32x32 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageAndTextLarge.

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_P_Location
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the location of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_P_SizingMode
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the current size of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_P_SmallImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 16x16 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageOnly or ImageAndTextNormal.

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_P_EditAreaWidth
data.value: Specifies the width of the edit area, excluding the label.

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_E_Cloned
data.value: Occurs after a tool has been cloned

data.name: LD_MaskedEditorTool_E_CloneDiscarded
data.value: Occurs when a clone of a tool is being discarded.

data.name: LD_RibbonButtonChrome_P_IsChecked
data.value: Gete/sets whether the chrome should be displayed reflecting the IsChecked state of the associated tool.

data.name: LD_RibbonButtonChrome_P_IsPressed
data.value: Gete/sets whether the chrome should be displayed reflecting the IsPressed state of the associated tool.

data.name: LD_RibbonButtonChrome_P_IsSegmentedButton
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean indicating if this element represents the button portion of a segmented MenuTool.

data.name: LD_RibbonButtonChrome_P_Padding
data.value: Returns the amount of padding between the border and the element.

data.name: LD_LabelTool_P_Caption
data.value: Returns/sets the caption associated with the tool.

data.value: Returns true if the tool has a caption with a length greater than zero, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_LargeToolCaptionPresenter_P_Text
data.value: Returns/sets the text to be displayed. Note that while this property is defined as type object to support binding to generic content, the control will ignore and values that are type string.

data.name: LD_LargeToolCaptionPresenter_P_Glyph
data.value: Returns/sets the UIElement that is displayed centered on the second line of the caption. The glyph will be centered with the seond line of text (if any).

data.name: LD_XamRibbon
data.value: Control that provides the functionality of a Microsoft Office 2007 Ribbon.

data.name: LD_ButtonGroup
data.value: A Panel derived element used to arrange logically related tools horizontally within a 'RibbonGroup'.

data.name: LD_ToolHorizontalWrapPanel
data.value: A Panel derived element used to arrange tools horizontally within a 'RibbonGroup'.

data.name: LD_ToolVerticalWrapPanel
data.value: A Panel derived element used to arrange tools vertically within a 'RibbonGroup'.

data.name: LD_ToolMenuItem_P_Tool
data.value: Returns the associated ribbon tool.

data.name: LD_RibbonWindowContentHost_P_StatusBarPadding
data.value: Returns the padding for the contained status bar based on the border width and presence of the resize grip.

data.name: LD_RibbonToolHelper_P_Caption
data.value: Returns/sets the caption associated with the tool.

data.name: LD_RibbonToolHelper_P_HasCaption
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a caption with a length greater than zero, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_RibbonToolHelper_P_HasImage
data.value: Returns true if the tool has a SmallImage specified, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_RibbonToolHelper_P_Id
data.value: Returns/sets a string id that is used to uniquely identify logical instances of the same tool within the xamRibbon.

data.name: LD_RibbonToolHelper_P_ImageResolved
data.value: Returns the image to be used by the tool based on its current location and sizing mode.

data.name: LD_RibbonToolHelper_P_IsOnQat
data.value: Returns true if the tool (or an instance of the tool with the same Id) exists on the QuickAccessToolbar, otherwise returns false. (read only)

data.name: LD_RibbonToolHelper_P_IsQatCommonTool
data.value: Returns true if the tool should be shown in the list of 'common tools' displayed in the QuickAccessToolbar's Quick Customize Menu.

data.name: LD_RibbonToolHelper_P_KeyTip
data.value: A string with a maximum length of 3 characters that is used to navigate to the item when keytips.

data.name: LD_RibbonToolHelper_P_LargeImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 32x32 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageAndTextLarge or in a MenuToolBase whose UseLargeImages is true.

data.name: LD_RibbonToolHelper_P_SizingMode
data.value: Returns an enumeration that indicates the current size of the tool. (read only)

data.name: LD_RibbonToolHelper_P_SmallImage
data.value: Returns/sets the 16x16 image to be used when the tool is sized to ImageOnly or ImageAndTextNormal.

data.name: SmartTag_MessageBody_RibbonGroupAlreadyOnQat
